name: Card Fools
description:
Made for the 2018 April Fool's Jam.  A mini collectible card game, with a variety of cards to collect.  Defeat the elemental guardians to discover new wonders and cards for your arsenal.

Controls:

ESC = Exit Game

Left Click Mouse = select/drag card

Right Click Mouse = Display card info

Tips:

  • To play card, drag the card to the center of the play area.  
  • Some cards require energy points to play.
  • Defeating unlocked opponents gives greater chance of gaining rarer more powerful cards!

*Disclaimer: Haven't tested the MacOS version.
